channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: 129: Stewarding Time & Numbering Our Days [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
Have you ever sat down and calculated how many days you have left on this Earth? What do you want to do with the rest of those days?

Don't miss this episode of Leadership Now with Dr. Aaron Rock as Aaron names many time-wasters in your life that keep you from being more effective in your ministry, and more productive in your personal life.

 

Click or tap here to check out Paul Dirks' Book!: Deep Discipleship for Dark Days: A Manual for Holding Fast to What is Good

 

More Resources:

We are excited to partner with the Fight Laugh Feast Network to reach more listeners. Download the app here: https://subsplash.com/fightlaughfeastnetwork/app

More resources at Dr. Aaron Rock’s blog: Pursuit of Glory https://pursuitofglory.org/
item.author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman
item.itunes:author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman

item.title: 128: Terror, Israel & Land Claims [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this week's episode, Dr. Aaron Rock covers the Israel/Hamas war, the history behind the the nation of Israel, and what we should be doing in response to these recent events.
